content.html: Breaking News: New York City will hospitalize more mentally ill people involuntarily, in a push to remove them from streets and subways, Mayor Eric Adams said. nyti.ms/3ATuU5v
content.value: Breaking News: New York City will hospitalize more mentally ill people involuntarily, in a push to remove them from streets and subways, Mayor Eric Adams said. nyti.ms/3ATuU5v

content.html: I have experienced involuntary hospitalization. Even with the loving support of friends and family, even with health insurance: it was the most traumatic experience of my life. Violence that you cannot comprehend. It's a big reason why I became an abolitionist. This is evil.
content.value:
I have experienced involuntary hospitalization. Even with the loving support of friends and family, even with health insurance: it was the most traumatic experience of my life. Violence that you cannot comprehend. It's a big reason why I became an abolitionist. 

This is evil.
